column1: # curie_map: # This contains the URLs prefixes used in the mapping file
#   skos: http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#  ### Always needed. Do not modify
#   sssom: https://w3id.org/sssom/               ### Always needed. Do not modify
#   subject: https://swmath.org/vocabulary/codemeta-mapping/vocab ### Source vocabulary URI. Default value
#   schema: "http://schema.org/"                  ### Always needed. Do not modify
#   codemeta: "https://w3id.org/codemeta/3.0"    ### Always needed. Do not modify
#   Mapping from the SWMATH software vocabulary to the CodeMeta 3.0 metadata standard
#   covering key fields such as identifiers

column2: and citations to enable interoperability between the vocabularies.
